abstract: Citigroup said Friday that it will sell its big student loan business to Sallie Mae and Discover Financial Services, a transaction it has sought as part of the bank’s reorganization.
snippet: Citigroup said Friday that it will sell its big student loan business to Sallie Mae and Discover Financial Services, a transaction it has sought as part of the bank’s reorganization.
lead_paragraph: 8:45 a.m. | Updated Citigroup said Friday that it will sell its big student loan business to Sallie Mae and Discover Financial Services for $600 million.

headline.main: Citi to Sell Its Student Loan Unit
